function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to UV radiation from artificial and natural sources","Impact":"Increased risk of skin damage and potential increase in skin cancer cases","Mitigation":"Using protective clothing and sunscreen, and limiting exposure to UV light","Technologies":"UV-blocking materials and sunscreen, along with education on UV exposure","People":"General public, especially those working outdoors or in medical facilities","Owner":"Health organizations, clothing manufacturers, and sunscreen producers"},{"Description":"Transmission of infections due to lack of surface cleanliness","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection outbreaks","Mitigation":"Regular and thorough cleaning of surfaces, and implementation of touchless disinfection techniques","Technologies":"Touchless disinfection tools and UV radiation for disinfection","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and the general public","Owner":"Healthcare facilities and transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Exposure to UVC light from disinfection devices","Impact":"Potential harm to eyes and skin if exposed directly to UVC light","Mitigation":"Proper training on safe use of UVC devices and use of protective equipment","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment and training programs on UVC safety","People":"Healthcare workers, maintenance staff, and transportation employees","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, maintenance companies, and transportation authorities"}]}
